mapper.insert: INSERT INTO whattodo_user (uid, upw, nm, gender, contact, postaddr, addrfirst, addrsecond, profileimg, level) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{nm}, ${gender}, ${contact}, ${postAddress}, #{addressFirst}, #{addressSecond},#{profileimg}, ${level})
INSERT INTO auto_login (auto_key, user_id, expiration_at) VALUES (#{key}, #{uid}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY))
mapper.select: SELECT iuser, uid, upw, nm, gender, profileimg, rdt, mdt FROM whattodo_user LEFT JOIN auto_login ON uid = auto_login.user_id WHERE auto_key = #{key} AND expiration_at > NOW() AND expiration_flag = FALSE
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_login SET expiration_flag = TRUE, expiration_at = NOW() WHERE auto_key = #{key} AND expiration_at > NOW() AND expiration_flag = FALSE
